songs.title: Black and White (Interlude)
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
My whole world is black and white, black and white
My whole world is black and white, black and white
What you say now? What you say now?
This whole world’s your playground
What you say now? What you say now?
Get down or fucking lay down
My whole world is black and white, black and white
My whole world is black and white, black and white
What you say now? What you say now?
This whole world’s your playground
What you say now? What you say now?
Get down or fucking lay down
